C

CustomFormatter - Class in sisop.logging
CustomFormatter formats the LogRecord as follows: [level] localized message with parameters

F

FairSemaphore - Class in sisop
This class implement a semaphore with a strictly FIFO policy using only synchronization method of Java 4.0
FairSemaphore() - Constructor for class sisop.FairSemaphore
Create a binary FairSemaphore
FairSemaphore(int) - Constructor for class sisop.FairSemaphore
Create a resource FairSemaphore

L

Log - Class in sisop.logging
Print to screen and save into log file the messages with different levels
Log() - Constructor for class sisop.logging.Log
 

P

P() - Method in class sisop.FairSemaphore
Check if the semaphore is free and takes control, otherwise insert the thread in the queue and suspend it on the semaphore
PORT_DIM - Static variable in class sisop.PortVector
 
PortVector<T> - Class in sisop
This class implement an array of synchronized port and provides the tools for communication between threads
PortVector(int) - Constructor for class sisop.PortVector
Create a vector of Synchronized port, each one with the same number of senders defined statically

R

receiveFrom(int[], int) - Method in class sisop.PortVector
Receive the first avaible message in the ports that want be checked, if there is at least one; otherwise it will be blocked until a message is received in those ports
receiveFrom() - Method in class sisop.Server
Extract a message from the buffer, if there is one, and return it
receiveFrom() - Method in class sisop.SynchPort
Receive, if there is at least one, a message from the synchronized port; otherwise it will be blocked
run() - Method in class sisop.Server
Run a loop where every time, if there is free space into the buffer, it receives a message from the first available sender.

S

sendTo(int, T, String) - Method in class sisop.PortVector
Send a message to a specific port of the vector.
sendTo(T, String) - Method in class sisop.SynchPort
Send a message to the synchronized port.
Server - Class in sisop
 
Server() - Constructor for class sisop.Server

sisop - package sisop
 
sisop.logging - package sisop.logging
 
SynchPort<T> - Class in sisop
This class implement a generic synchronized port, using FairSemaphore, compared to type
SynchPort(int) - Constructor for class sisop.SynchPort
Create a synchronized port for the required senders

V

V() - Method in class sisop.FairSemaphore
Release the control of the semaphore; if there is a thread suspended on the semaphore, wake up the first
